msg: DIRSHARED-81: making decorate() into newControl() overload to be consistent

author: markt
msg: Reduce severity level. The ASF Jira instance logs were filling with these

author: sebb
msg: Bug 50659 - JMeter server does not support concurrent tests - prevent client from starting another
Remove thread from ClientJMeterEngine - if it is required for GUI, then let the GUI create the thread
This allows proper return of error conditions
Also replace System.exit() with interrupt() of RMI thread

author: akarasulu
msg: renaming decorate() method so it is a newCodecControl() overload

author: stsp
msg: * CHANGES: Mention issue number for svn patch. List git diff annotations
as an improvement instead of major new feature. Mention the --diff
option of 'svn log'. Spell 'equivalent' in a non-Texan accent.
